/usr/bin/c++   -std=c++0x -g  -rdynamic CMakeFiles/ShadowViewer.dir/glfw_window.cpp.o CMakeFiles/ShadowViewer.dir/glmath.cpp.o CMakeFiles/ShadowViewer.dir/main.cpp.o CMakeFiles/ShadowViewer.dir/shader.cpp.o CMakeFiles/ShadowViewer.dir/ShadowViewer.cpp.o CMakeFiles/ShadowViewer.dir/Mesh.cpp.o CMakeFiles/ShadowViewer.dir/sphere.cpp.o  -o ../ShadowViewer -Wl,-rpath,/home/joeft/Git/CG-HS18/assignment_7/cmake-build-debug ../liblodePNG.a ../libglfw.so.3.1 ../libglew.so -lOpenGL -lGLX -lGLU -lrt -lm -lX11 -lpthread -lXrandr -lXinerama -lXi -lXxf86vm -lXcursor -ldl
